data.title: Home
data.meta_description: The Mid City Hotel offers budget accommodation in the CBD of Ballarat. 5 minutes from Sovereign Hill and Lake Wendouree.
data.text:
About Us

Located in the heart of Ballaratâs CBD, The Mid City Hotel offers the perfect location for business or leisure travellers.

The Mid City Hotel is the largest CBD hotel and offers a range of spacious rooms including Queen Rooms, Twin rooms, King Deluxe rooms, Executive suites and a three bedroom self-contained apartment.

Guests staying at The Mid City Hotel will be within walking distance to many of Ballaratâs attractions including Her Majestyâs Theatre, Ballarat Art Gallery, The Botanical Gardens and Lake Wendouree as well as public transport, cafes, restaurants and wine bars.

Enjoy a scrumptious full buffet breakfast daily or a la carte dining in our restaurant. You can even sit back and relax with a pre or post dinner drink in our lounge bar. Donât want to leave your room? We also have an in room dining menu available for breakfast and dinner.

Our function spaces offer flexible options for your next conference or event. From boardroom meetings to cocktail parties, we can tailor a package to suit your requirements.

Offering 24/7 reception, complimentary on-site parking and free wifi The Mid City Hotel is the perfect choice for your upcoming visit.

Learn More
